page.title: 04CONTINUED FROM PAGE 3
page.content:
NYPRO disaster in the 1970's. The public attitude around the {Village }of Amcotts is somewhat normal to that of other villages.It seems that the younger element of the village have sarcasticly named the bus stop "Amcotts Village Hall".
{NEAP HOUSE AND RIVER TRENT People live here because the farmland is here and it is open.The main crops which are grown are rape,wheat and corn.Each farm has approximatley 4 in each family.There is no irrigation from the trent but there is a small hydro-electric scheme. There is a lot of noise from the traffic which is mainly lorries coming and going from the wharf.The noise from the ships loading and unloading keeps the occupants in the houses nearby away.The lorries exhaust fumes
